Portal Frames can be found inside of the Hallowed Sepulchre. The player can use runes to conjure the portal, and step through to reach the other side and loot the coffin. Conjuring the portal will reward 200 Magic experience. Crossing through the portal will reward the player 75 to 80 Agility experience, depending on the floor, with experience given for crossing both ways. The portal can be crossed again, but experience is only awarded for the first crossing and return. After the timer runs out the portal can no longer be conjured, but can continue to be crossed for experience.

Failing to conjure the portal twice in a row will cause the portal frame to break, which prevents additional attempts at conjuring it (and accessing the coffin on the other side).

When equipped, the Hallowed focus will remove the possibility of failure when conjuring a portal.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
2 July 2020
(update)

The Agility XP gained from treasure encounters on Floor 5 of the Hallowed Sepulchre has been reduced from 100XP to 80XP.

24 June 2020
(update)

The XP rates for completing a treasure encounter have been adjusted. Floors 3 and 4 changed from 50 to 75, and floor 5 changed from 50 to 100.

18 June 2020
(update)

The portals should now be slightly more helpful by attempting to put you in-range of them instead of saying "You can't reach that from here."

'''Portal Frames''' can be found inside of the [[Hallowed Sepulchre]]. The player can use runes to conjure the portal, and step through to reach the other side and loot the [[Coffin (Hallowed Sepulchre)|coffin]]. Conjuring the portal will reward 200 {{SCP|Magic|link=yes}} experience. Crossing through the portal will reward the player 75 to 80 {{SCP|Agility|link=yes}} experience, depending on the floor, with experience given for crossing both ways. The portal can be crossed again, but experience is only awarded for the first crossing and return. After the timer runs out the portal can no longer be conjured, but can continue to be crossed for experience.

Failing to conjure the portal twice in a row will cause the portal frame to break, which prevents additional attempts at conjuring it (and accessing the coffin on the other side).

When equipped, the [[Hallowed focus]] will remove the possibility of failure when conjuring a portal.
